mapper.sql: id, create_time, create_user, issueno, a_qiu, a_pianyi, a_daxiao, a_danshuang, a_yushu, b_qiu, b_pianyi, b_daxiao, b_danshuang, b_yushu, c_qiu, c_pianyi, c_daxiao, c_danshuang, c_yushu, d_qiu, d_pianyi, d_daxiao, d_danshuang, d_yushu, e_qiu, e_pianyi, e_daxiao, e_danshuang, e_yushu, f_qiu, f_pianyi, f_daxiao, f_danshuang, f_yushu, sum_value, tail_sum_value, san_section, si_section, qi_section, daxiao_ratio, danshuang_ratio,a_wuxing,b_wuxing,c_wuxing,d_wuxing,e_wuxing,f_wuxing
mapper.select: SELECT yuShu,countYuShu FROM (SELECT a.${columnNameYuShu} yuShu, COUNT(a.${columnNameYuShu}) countYuShu FROM (SELECT * FROM ssq_detail_info WHERE id IN (SELECT id + 1 FROM ssq_detail_info WHERE ${columnName} = '${columnValue}' and issueno <= ${issueno}) ORDER BY issueno DESC LIMIT 0, 15) a GROUP BY a.${columnNameYuShu}) b ORDER BY b.countYuShu DESC

SELECT MIN(b.SUM_VALUE) sumMinValue, MAX(b.SUM_VALUE) sumMaxValue, AVG(b.SUM_VALUE) sumAvgValue FROM (SELECT a.SUM_VALUE SUM_VALUE FROM (SELECT * FROM ssq_detail_info WHERE id IN (SELECT id + 1 FROM `ssq_detail_info` WHERE SUM_VALUE >= #{minValue} AND SUM_VALUE <= ${maxValue} and issueno <= ${issueno}) ORDER BY issueno DESC LIMIT 0, 15) a GROUP BY a.SUM_VALUE) b ORDER BY b.SUM_VALUE DESC

SELECT MIN(b.tail_sum_value) sumMinValue, MAX(b.tail_sum_value) sumMaxValue, AVG(b.tail_sum_value) sumAvgValue FROM (SELECT a.tail_sum_value tail_sum_value FROM (SELECT * FROM ssq_detail_info WHERE id IN (SELECT id + 1 FROM `ssq_detail_info` WHERE tail_sum_value = ${maxValue} and issueno <= ${issueno} ) ORDER BY issueno DESC LIMIT 0, 15) a GROUP BY a.tail_sum_value) b ORDER BY b.tail_sum_value DESC

SELECT a.san_section FROM (SELECT * FROM ssq_detail_info WHERE id IN (SELECT id + 1 FROM `ssq_detail_info` WHERE san_section = '${sanSection}' and issueno <= ${issueno}) ORDER BY issueno DESC LIMIT 0, 20) a GROUP BY a.san_section ORDER BY issueno DESC limit 0,4
